channel.title: iSketch - Come join the luls - WIN 1M RSGP
channel.description:
http://www.isketch.net/isketch.shtml
Room Name: MITB Circlejerk
You should find it at the bottom. It's basically pictionary online

item.title: iSketch - Come join the luls - WIN 1M RSGP
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:13, topic:438748”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=541456.msg3966780#msg3966780 date=1333790240]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=541456.msg3966668#msg3966668 date=1333770767]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=541456.msg3966635#msg3966635 date=1333768811]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=541456.msg3966500#msg3966500 date=1333761317]
Wouldn’t this be considered a game?
[/quote]Yes How about you check out the section rules before reporting the thread though.
[/quote]I thought there used to be a rule about no “forum games” 0.o
[/quote]Since when is a game on an external website a “forum game”?
[/quote]tell me since when are “how fast you type competitions” are considered a forum game[/quote]How about you both stop arguing because the rule was only to discourage spamming (‘count to 1000’ threads etc), but it’s gone now as cases can always be handled on the no spamming rule. No reason for you to try to interpret the rules

Read full topic
item.source: iSketch - Come join the luls - WIN 1M RSGP
